mapper.select: SELECT book.book_id, book.title, book.publisher, book.pubDate ,book.borrowedDate, book.borrower_id, book.status, reader.reader_id, reader.name, reader.address, reader.frozen FROM book LEFT JOIN reader ON book.borrower_id = reader.reader_id

SELECT book.book_id, book.title, book.publisher, book.pubDate ,book.borrowedDate, book.borrower_id, book.status, reader.reader_id, reader.name, reader.address, reader.frozen FROM book LEFT JOIN reader ON book.borrower_id = reader.reader_id WHERE book_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (title, publisher, pubDate) VALUES (#{title}, #{publisher}, #{pubDate})
